select
distinct
from channel_details
order by ${orderByClause}

select count(1) from channel_details
id = #{paramMap.id} AND
channel_id = #{paramMap.channelId} AND
channel_trans_code = #{paramMap.channelTransCode} AND
pay_type = #{paramMap.payType} AND
mer_order_id = #{paramMap.merOrderId} AND
order_id = #{paramMap.orderId} AND
amount = #{paramMap.amount} AND
type = #{paramMap.type} AND
in_amount = #{paramMap.inAmount} AND
out_amount = #{paramMap.outAmount} AND
fee = #{paramMap.fee} AND
fee_profit = #{paramMap.feeProfit} AND
total_balance = #{paramMap.totalBalance} AND
update_time = #{paramMap.updateTime} AND
DATE_FORMAT( trade_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT( update_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')

FROM channel_details

channel_trans_code = #{paramMap.channelTransCode} AND
pay_type = #{paramMap.payType} AND

amount = #{paramMap.amount} AND

in_amount = #{paramMap.inAmount} AND

DATE_FORMAT( trade_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT( update_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by timestamp desc,update_time desc LIMIT #{paramMap.startPage},#{paramMap.pageSize}
